title: Amend a Purchase Order
description: Production needs to increase the quantity of a component on a purchase order that has already been submitted but not yet shipped.

tasks.description: Find the original purchase order and verify its status is 'Submitted' or 'Acknowledged'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the PO and confirms it has not shipped yet.

tasks.description: Create a PO amendment to change the quantity on the relevant line item.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a change order request for the PO.

tasks.description: Send the amended PO to the supplier and request confirmation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the revised PO and awaits acknowledgement from the supplier.
